title: I have a pixel 3 and "hey google" isn't working. I've done all the tips in the support links.
content: I've tried all of the support link suggestions but "hey google" only works when I press the home key. I've ensured voicematch is on, language is correct, data was cleared, everything is up to date but it still will not unlocky phone or register with hands free commands
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
